item.title: Phoneblur: Single Service Temporary Numbers
item.description: Need a temporary number for a single service? Do you only require access to this number for a short amount of time? A temporary subscription plan could be the right choice for you! Single service temporary numbers provide a US-based phone number for use on one designated service. You can rent these numbers in increments of one week or two weeks. This service is offered as a temporary subscription plan: there are no renewals, no hassle, and no need to remember to top up your credit balance.
